1.<cs_pchero>は ルッチーと合流し|シェルブリッジで 夜を待った……。: <cs_pchero> met up with Lucchie and waited|for the night at Shell Bridge...

2.「うっし 夜も来たし| さっそく やっちゃいますかぁ～！| <cs_pchero: Well, the night is here, so let's get to it!|Take my picture, <cs_pchero>!

3.「夜空に ブチアゲてやんぜ！！| 遊び人のォ～ ファイア・ワークス！！: I'm gonna shoot it into the night sky!|Gadabout Fireworks!

7.「うおーい！ 見てたか デスワーク！！| 遊びクラブは てめぇなんかに 負けねー: Whoa! You see that, Deathwerk? I'm not gonna|let you beat me in the play club!

9.「なんだ パイセンか！| いったい どこ行ってたんだぁ～？: What, Paisen! Where the hell have you been?

11.「オイオイ マジかよ……。| 遊び人を襲ってた デスワークの正体は……: Oy, seriously... the death work that was|attacking the gadabout was...

12.「……たしかに ワタクシは| 労魔デスワークと 呼ばれているようデスが| そこに: It is true that I am called Labor Demon|Deathwork, but there is a misunderstanding|there, Mr. Lucchie.

13.「ワタクシの行為は 皆サマが ココロにひめた| 願いをかなえるという 奉仕活動な: My act is a service to fulfill the wishes that|everyone has in their hearts. I am doing this|treatment to wish for your happiness.

14.「幸福って……なんのことだよ？| デスワークは遊び人を襲って 無理矢理働かせる|: Happiness... what are you talking about? I|thought death work was a demon of labor that|attacked gadabouts and forced them to work!

15.「ひとつ……古い話を お聞かせしまショウ。: Let me tell you an old story.

16.「形あるモノは すべて 滅びゆくサダメ……| やがて故障し 歴史の闇に埋もれてい: Everything that has a form is|dying...eventually it will break down and be|buried in the darkness of history.

17.「時を経て 地中から発掘された ロボは| ひとりの遊び人に拾われ 修理されたのデ:
After a long time, the robot was unearthed|from the ground, found by a gadabout, and|repaired. A photo uploading function was|
|added...

18.「そして 遊び人タチの写真を 取り込んでは| 写真に宿る 陽の感情をも読み込んで:
And when he took pictures of the gadabouts, he|also read the yang emotion that resided in the|pictures, thus forming the ostensibly cheerful|
|character.

19.「デスが…… 奉仕ロボは 写真に宿った| 遊び人タチの心に潜む 負の感情さえも|: But the service robot can read the negative|emotions that lurk in the hearts of the|gadabout in the photo. That's exactly...

20.「遊び人として生きるコトへの ためらい。| 社会への後ろめたさ。未来への不安……: Hesitation to live as a gadabout. Guilt toward|society. The gadabout's hesitation gave birth|to Death Work!

21.「デスワークは パイセンの中の| 二重人格みてぇなモンってことか……。| だけど: Death work is like a double personality inside|Plug, but....

22.「……遊び人が デスワークの存在を| 願ってるはずねーだろ！ オレらは| 遊び人: How could a gadabout wish death work into|existence? We're proud to be gadabouts!

23.「イイエ。アナタがた 遊び人の皆サマは| ワタクシの施術を 求めていらっしゃるの: Yes. You gadabouts are all asking for my|treatment! I'll find out right away!

24.「グッ！？ な…なんだ これ……！？| ムネに重苦しいモヤモヤが わきあがってく: Ggh! What is this? A heavy, heavy feeling is|rising in my chest!

25.「キョキョキョ！ やはり ワタクシの| マインドセラピーは 効果絶大のようデスね: Kyoukyoukyou! As I thought, my mind therapy|seems to be very effective!

26.「遊び人の皆サマの 真の願いをかなえる方法は| たったひとつだけ…… 遊び人をヤ: There is only one way to fulfill the true|wishes of all gadabouts and that is to stop|being gadabouts and go to work!

27.「アナタ……ワタクシの マインドセラピーが| 全く効いてないのデスか！？ まるで: Are you sure my mind therapy isn't working at|all? It's as if being a gadabout is a no-|brainer...

28.「……そんなコトは ありえまセン！ バグだ！| バグは 排除しなければなりまセン: Plug, that's not possible! It's a bug! Bugs|have to be eliminated! Come on, work, work!

29.「ギギ…バ…バカな……ッ！| 遊び人でいるコトに……迷いが…ないとは……: Gigi... ba... ba... baka... baka... baka! I|didn't think you had any doubts... about being|a gadabout...

33.「おおッ パイセン！！| デスワークは 消えちまったんだな！？| なあ 大丈夫か: Oh, Plug! Death work has disappeared, hasn't|it! Hey, are you okay, Plug!

34.「ス…スマネェ……| おどるチカラが もう残ってねえみてェだ……。: S...smaneh...it looks like you don't have any|energy left to dance...

35.「オレと…遊んでくれて……| アリガトよォ……。| た…のしかっ…た……ぜィ……: Thanks for... playing... with... me... and...|having... fun... with... me...

39.「んあ！？| な～んか 見たことあるわ～思うてたら| コイツ なつかしの鉄クズや: What? I was thinking, "I've seen this guy|before..." But it turns out he's the iron|scrapper from my youth!

40.「……なんだよ 父ちゃん。| パイセンのこと 知ってんのか？: ...What the hell, Dad? You know Plug?

41.「ハァ～ アホちゃうかァ？ 知ってるも何も| コイツは 昔 ワイが修理したんやで: Are you stupid? I know you know, but I fixed|this guy a long time ago!

42.「せやけど…… もう あかんわ。| 直りそうもあらへんな……。| 無事なのは ア: But... it's no good now. The only thing that's|safe is the uploader.

44.「もともと 古代の機械のようだし……| もう 寿命なのかもしれないわねぇ。: It seems like an ancient machine to begin|with... maybe it has reached the end of its|life span.

45.「アップローダーが生きてるなら……。: If the uploader is still alive...

46.「<cs_pchero>っち…… パイセンへの| せめてもの とむらいとして さ: <cs_pchero>... as a small token of|appreciation to Plug, could you please take a|picture of the fireworks you just saw?

47.<cs_pchero>は 花火の写真を|パイセンに 読み込ませた！: <cs_pchero> loaded the pyrotechnics pics|into his Plug!

48.「パイセン…… 今まで ありがとな。| もっと 一緒に 遊びたかったぜ……。: Plug... thanks for everything. I wish we could|have had more fun together...

49.「……ホア！？| い…いま ピカって 光らんかった？: What? Didn't you just get a flash?

51.「ドハデな花火が アガってたんで！！| お祭り好きの血が さわいじゃって……|: The fireworks were so loud and exciting! My|festival-loving blood got excited... and the|next thing I know, I'm here!

52.「あと……写真も 見ましたァ！！| マジ やばかったっす！ サイコーでしたァ！！: And...I saw the pictures! It was really|awesome! It was great! I really want to play|with Mr. Lucchie!

53.「写真 あたしも見たけど| ちょーいいね！ ……なカンジだった！: I saw the pictures too and they are great! It|was like....

54.「あそクラ やめるなんて言って ごめん……。| もし よかったら また遊んでほし: I'm sorry I said I was quitting Asokura... but|if you want, I'd love it if you'd play with me|again! Because it's more fun with you guys!

56.「オイ ジブンら！！| パ…パイセンが……！！: Hey, Jibun and the others! The... plug...!

58.「さっきの写真に いいね！ が| いっぱい 集まってきてるんだ～！: I like your picture! on the photo I just took!

62.「いいね！ に込められた 人々の楽しい感情が| パイセンの回路に チカラをあたえ: Like it! may have given power to Plug's|circuits and worked miracles.

63.「……イマドキの遊び人とやらも| 捨てたモンじゃないわね。彼らなら| 遊びで 世: ...Trendy Gadabouts are not to be|underestimated. They could make the whole|world happy.

64.「せやな…… 考えを改めなあかん。| アイツらの前には 無限の可能性が広がってん:
You're right... I have to change my mind. They|have unlimited possibilities spread out before|them. They are the ones who will make the|
|future of gadabouts.

66.夜遅くまで パーティーは もよおされ|ある者は歌い ある者は踊って|遊びクラブ復: The party went on until late into the night,|with some singing, some dancing, and others|reveling in the joy of the club's revival.

67.そして 夜が明けた……！|遊びハウスに 戻ろう。<me 64>: And the dawn breaks...! Let's go back to|Gadabode.<me 64>
